## DiffArrSet type

An array patch operation that sets the element at `index` to `value`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
type DiffArrSet = {
    op: 'set';
    index: number;
    value: DiffValue;
};
```
**References:** [DiffValue](doc/markdown/./base.diffvalue.md)
